name: Full Metal AI
description:
FULL METAL AI is  a fast - paced Twin-Stick-Shooter set in a postapocalyptic Machine-world, where only Robots managed to survive. 

 The player takes control of a security robot, and tries to defend the AI of the planet against other robots which got corrupted by a bug in the system.

Features:

  • Kick Ass Robot
  • Overclocking System: short-term overclocking for each weapon to increase their efficiency in battle. But using it to long will cause weapon jamming  and paralyze you for a few seconds. Making you vulnerable!
  • 3 Weapons: each different with a unique overclocking mechanic.
  • 4 Enemies: from big tanks ´til stealth units
  • Modifier: to change the difficulty and the risk & reward balance
  • Power-Ups: like DECOY, SHIELD, FIRE RATE BOOSTER, etc . For instant combat improvement
  • Reactive Spawning System: forcing the player always to consider his combat strategy
